name: sst0
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, ct0))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Kol2 ∧ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2)∧ c0 ⊆ c1)→ c1 ∈ Kol2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, ct0))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ct0), wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2), wcel(cres(cid, c2), co(c1, ccn, c0))), wcel(c1, ct0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, ct0))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ct0), wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2), wcel(cres(cid, c2), co(c1, ccn, c0))), wcel(c1, ct0))

|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, ct0))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ct0), wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2), wcel(cres(cid, c2), co(c1, ccn, c0))), wcel(c1, ct0))

stmt.origin: cnt0(c0, cres(cid, c2), c2, c2, c1)

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ct0), wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2), wcel(cres(cid, c2), co(c1, ccn, c0))), wcel(c1, ct0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, ct0))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Kol2 ∧ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2)∧ c0 ⊆ c1)→ c1 ∈ Kol2)
⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0

comment: A topology finer than a T_0 topology is T_0. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
